name: Game A Week - Week 6
description:
In gift a game we were supposed to create a game that someone else would like, for this I have created a small RogueLike shooter, in Rogue you are being attacked by swarms of zombies that spawn on a timer system, with each wave more and more zombies are thrown at you luckily they drop gold on death; Use this to open chests for extra power and help you survive longer, How long can you survive?

Controls:
  • WASD:- Movement
  • Q:- Ability 1 (Machine Gun)
  • E:- Ability 2 (Sniper)
  • Left Click:- Shoot
Assets Used:
  • Assault Rifle Icon by PNGWING on pngwing
  • Sniper Icon by Firm Mathers on Steam Community
